tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE targeted_locations (
    location_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    location_name VARCHAR(100),
    target_audience VARCHAR(50),
    campaign_budget DECIMAL(10,2),
    campaign_start_date DATE,
    campaign_end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE marketing_stunts (
    stunt_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    stunt_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    location_id INT REFERENCES targeted_locations(location_id),
    stunt_date DATE,
    stunt_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE marketing_stunts (
  stunt_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  stunt_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  location_id INT,
  stunt_date DATE NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (location_id) REFERENCES targeted_locations(location_id)
);

CREATE TABLE stunt_participants (
  participant_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  stunt_id INT,
  participant_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  participant_email VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (stunt_id) REFERENCES marketing_stunts(stunt_id)
);

CREATE TABLE marketing_stunts (
  stunt_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  stunt_name VARCHAR(50),
  location_id INT,
  team_id INT,
  stunt_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE MarketingStunts (
 stunt_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 stunt_name VARCHAR(255),
 description TEXT,
 cost DECIMAL(10, 2),
 location_id INT,
 FOREIGN KEY (location_id) REFERENCES TargetedLocations(location_id)
);

CREATE TABLE MarketingTeam (
 team_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 team_name VARCHAR(255),
 team_lead VARCHAR(100),
 location_id INT,
 FOREIGN KEY (location_id) REFERENCES TargetedLocations(location_id)
);

CREATE TABLE MarketingCampaigns (
 campaign_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 campaign_name VARCHAR(255),
 start_date DATE,
 end_date DATE,
 location_id INT,
 FOREIGN KEY (location_id) REFERENCES TargetedLocations(location_id)
);

CREATE TABLE CampaignResults (
 result_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 campaign_id INT,
 success_rate DECIMAL(5, 2),
 feedback TEXT,
 FOREIGN KEY (campaign_id) REFERENCES MarketingCampaigns(campaign_id)
);
